description:
### 11.258 tmedian

Pick median pixels from several successive input video frames.

The filter accepts the following options:

**radius**

    Set radius of median filter. Default is 1. Allowed range is from 1 to 127. 

**planes**

    Set which planes to filter. Default value is 15, by which all planes are processed. 

**percentile**

    Set median percentile. Default value is 0.5. Default value of 0.5 will pick always median values, while 0 will pick minimum values, and 1 maximum values.
name: tmedian

options.description: Set radius of median filter. Default is 1. Allowed range is from 1 to 127.
options.name: radius

options.description: Set which planes to filter. Default value is 15, by which all planes are processed.
options.name: planes

options.description: Set median percentile. Default value is 0.5. Default value of 0.5 will pick always median values, while 0 will pick minimum values, and 1 maximum values.
options.name: percentile
